testcase.classname: To validate user login and Amazon Website search functionality
testcase.name: User validates search, add filters, sort and wishlist functionality in Edge
testcase.system-out: Given User search a specific product on search tab, row "7" column "0"......passed When User select 2 brands from checkbox.....................................passed And User select a category and price range..................................passed And User select a Bag and adds to wishlist..................................passed And User navigates to 1st tab and clears the search field...................passed When User search a specific product on search tab, row "8" column "0".......passed And User sorts the search results and filters according to ratings..........passed Then User select a wallet and add to wishlist...............................passed
